title: Starter Deck Rework
description:
Reworks the starter deck of each character to make them more unique.

[hr][/hr]

[b]Changes[/b]
[list]
[*]Strikes and Defends have a unique upgrade that fits one of their gimmicks.
[*]Ironclad has a Strike replaced with a new card, Frenzy - Lose 3 HP. Gain 1(+1) Strength.
[*]The Silent has 1 Strike and 1 Defend removed to make her 4/4/1/1.
[/list]

Everything is configurable.

[hr][/hr]

Source code: https://github.com/stormytuna/StarterDeckRework

If you enjoy my work, [url=https://ko-fi.com/stormytuna]please consider donating[/url]
changeNote:
v1.2

- Fix Frenzy+ not applying correct amount of Strength if it was stacking on existing Strength.
- Nerf Ironclad Strike+ from 8 damage to 7.
- Tweak Ironclad Defend+ to grant a flat amount of block plus a bonus for each enemy in combat.
- Change Watcher Strike+ to shuffle an Insight into draw pile.
- Change Watcher Defend+ to Scry 2 and Draw 1 if your last played card was a Skill.
